verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Meeremi vedakuchunnaru ? Sooryuni krinda jarugu kriyal vyardhame{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa chedu margamunu vidachitini Neechapu jeevitamunu vidichitini Aayana doruku kalamunandu Vedaga kshamiyinchi kadige nannu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aayana raajyamun vedakuchunnanu Thaane samastamu niththunane gada Kristulo lepabaditi chintinchaka Pai nunna vatine ne vedakedanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni chittamu ne neruguchunu Aathmache daanini neraverchedanu Siyonu parvatamupai nunna Gorrepillanu ne vembadinchedanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praardhana sahavasamunu pondi Rottenu viruchutalo yeda thegaka Devuni vaakya kadgamu booni Sevanu chetumu sangamu nandu{/lang-eng}
